bibl.title: Mithras at Hermopolis and Memphis.
Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993
bibl.author: HARRIS, J.R.

bibl.note: Corrects a number of misconceptions surrounding the presence of mithraism in Egypt, reviews the existing evidence from the Roman period, and suggests that mithraism as such can, up to the present, be documented with any degree of certainty at only two sites: Hermopolis Magna and Memphis.
HARRIS J.R., Mithras at Hermopolis and Memphis.
